Reviews.Content: rome colleagues stayed hotels near termini una modern stylish pressure showers flatscreen tv comfortable beds quiet hotels weve stayed suffer massively noise streets una soundproofed usually pay night bb compares hotels 20 mins walk colosseo trevi fountain literally 2 minutes termini trains including fiumicino service metro highly recommended business travellers people base rome trip

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful design hotel conviniently located”
Reviews.Author: Nitus
Reviews.Content: stayed night february booked inexpensive rate arrived 10am anyhow front desk staff friendly welcoming attitude rome nonitalian speaking tourist handed map travel guide returned 2pm finally beautifully designed bright due white painted walls beware design modern meet personal taste youre baroque italian style nevertheless comfy bed nice flatscreen tv bbc world nonitalian channel effective blinds temperature control units located wall bedside tables winter outside temperature 1015 degrees celsius manage temperature below 23 degrees plus hand quietness hundred meters romes termini central train station expected noise heard bathroom equipped toilet shower sink bidet shower featured detachable shower head rainshower head mounted ceiling range toiletries provided huge towels soft techie appreciated rfid key cards insert doors lock briefly hold front card reader led lighting installed wardrobes clothing rail light nice gimmick breakfast lot usual italian breakfast fare anyhow couple likes travel lot breakfast buffets left bit disappointed broad selection sweet cakes pastries nice scrambled eggs greasy bacon italian sausages cold tried toast bread meat cold cuts cheeses ok compared hotels stayed italy location clean modern design spacious equipped decent breakfast minor flaws minor italy hotel beautiful trip rome

Reviews.Title: “Excellent with a bathroom you could live in”
Reviews.Author: rockysgirl38
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights nice immaculately clean slippers toiletries safe wardrobe lighted wardrobe according travelling companion bathroom live rain shower bidet huge sink complaint twin beds gap ok friends uncomfortable staff friendly helpful accommodating breakfast continental selection pots coffee am excellent location walk termini minutes public transport services run stayed 40th definitely recommend hotel reservation stay

Reviews.Title: “Good for the Cost-conscious”
Reviews.Author: jjm523
Reviews.Content: short nice clean hotel mediocre location rome suited business travelers costconscious travelers 3 minute walk termini train station staff business computers didnt acrobat allowed computer print boarding pass pretty exceptional bed incredibly comfortable superior double size breakfast buffet 10 loved rain shower bar blah personality decent choice deal paid night probably worth night gripe hotel lacks character whatsoever feels completely soulless wasnt crazy theres little
